response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand its significance to you and am confident it will serve as a valuable asset. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its worth to both of us. Should you decide to proceed, I assure you of a seamless transaction and excellent customer service. I look forward to your positive response. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1200000}
